documentation.text:
@dev Delegates voting power of this contract to another address.
 @param _delegate: address - Address of delegate.

@dev Retrieves current state of the proposal  
 @return ProposalState - The state of the proposal
    Pending: 0
    Active: 1
    Canceled: 2
    Defeated: 3 
    Succeeded: 4
    Queued: 5
    Expired: 6
    Executed: 7
